name: Filter.tendsto_nhds_atTop
initialProofState:
X : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace X
inst✝² : PartialOrder X
inst✝¹ : OrderTopology X
inst✝ : NoMaxOrder X
⊢ Filter.Tendsto nhds Filter.atTop (nhds Filter.atTop)
decl:
protected theorem tendsto_nhds_atTop [NoMaxOrder X] : Tendsto 𝓝 (atTop : Filter X) (𝓝 atTop) :=
  Filter.tendsto_nhds_atTop_iff.2 fun x => (eventually_gt_atTop x).mono fun _ => le_mem_nhds

name: Filter.tendsto_nhds_atBot
initialProofState:
X : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace X
inst✝² : PartialOrder X
inst✝¹ : OrderTopology X
inst✝ : NoMinOrder X
⊢ Filter.Tendsto nhds Filter.atBot (nhds Filter.atBot)
decl:
protected theorem tendsto_nhds_atBot [NoMinOrder X] : Tendsto 𝓝 (atBot : Filter X) (𝓝 atBot) :=
  @Filter.tendsto_nhds_atTop Xᵒᵈ _ _ _ _

name: Filter.Tendsto.nhds_atTop
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
X : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace X
inst✝² : PartialOrder X
inst✝¹ : OrderTopology X
inst✝ : NoMaxOrder X
f : α → X
l : Filter α
h : Filter.Tendsto f l Filter.atTop
⊢ Filter.Tendsto (Function.comp nhds f) l (nhds Filter.atTop)
decl:
theorem Tendsto.nhds_atTop [NoMaxOrder X] {f : α → X} {l : Filter α} (h : Tendsto f l atTop) :
    Tendsto (𝓝 ∘ f) l (𝓝 atTop) :=
  Filter.tendsto_nhds_atTop.comp h

name: Filter.Tendsto.nhds_atBot
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
X : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace X
inst✝² : PartialOrder X
inst✝¹ : OrderTopology X
inst✝ : NoMinOrder X
f : α → X
l : Filter α
h : Filter.Tendsto f l Filter.atBot
⊢ Filter.Tendsto (Function.comp nhds f) l (nhds Filter.atBot)
